meta.title: Contract #005: Dead Man Walking
meta.description: BIO-DATA MISMATCH: Cloud sync conflicts with forensic pathology. Determine true time of death.
meta.journal: The Cloud Data was fabricated to create a digital alibi. The victim was already dead at 20:00. The steps recorded at 21:30 were injected into the server to make it look like they were still alive.

nodes.text: 20:00 - Coroner Report: Estimated Time of Death based on liver temp.
21:30 - Cloud Sync: User's FitBit uploads 5,000 steps (Jogging Pace).
22:00 - Witness Statement: Dog walker discovers body in Phoenix Park.
22:15 - Garda Dispatch: Units arrive at scene.
